titles.title: Electronic Signature Standards Act
Electronic Signature Standards Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to establish uniform standards for the use of electronic signatures with respect to any request for disclosure of a taxpayer's return or return information to a practitioner.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Electronic Signature Standards Act
This bill directs the Department of the Treasury to establish uniform guidance for the use of electronic signatures with respect to any request for disclosure of a taxpayer's return or return information.
